messages.msgSnippet: Hi Leslie!  More info off list would be great..thanks!  hopefull2005@earthlink.net Small world!  We are also a military family, living in Richlands, NC and
messages.messageBody:
Hi Leslie! More info off list would be great..thanks! hopefull2005@...

Small world! We are also a military family, living in Richlands, NC and moving to Beaufort!

Kelly, thanks for the invite to SOS! I'll see you there..

Sounds like a great time is waiting for us in SC : )

--Kim
www.bigyellowbox.net/kc
Big Yellow Box by CRAYOLA!

______________________________________________________________________

**************

Hi Kim, I'm not sure if anyone responded yet because my email inbox is a
mess! So at the risk of being redundant....

yes, Option 3 is the way to go. I can give you more info, maybe off-list?

We moved here from Jacksonville, NC last year and are a military family. We
are in Beaufort, where are you going to be?

Kelly (one of this list's moderators) also has the schoolsoutsupport yahoo
group that is a state-wide unschoolers' list.

Good luck with your move....I am still not completely unpacked! Ack!

Leslie in (Beaufort) SC



Date: Tue, 26 Apr 2005 16:40:21 -0400
From: kbcdlovejo@...
Subject: Re: unschooling in SC, was Digest Number 409

Yes---log on to SchoolsOutSupport@yahoogroups.com for the SC
unschoolers' group. Leslie's begging for a Mom's Night Out in Columbia
one day soon, and I've been trying to find a date for a CiCi's pizza
and Park Day in these next two weeks.

We'll look for you at SOS!

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
October 6-9, 2005
http://liveandlearnconference.org
